Summary: extremely bright white orb over Springfield Oregon
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my apartment looking out my open window I saw an extremely bright white orb in the sky that appeared to hover I grabbed my camera as fast as i could but by the time I got it the orb was gone physicaly saw it for 5-10 seconds and it was about a mile or so away from where I was and so everyone knows its really hard to fill out this ufo report on a droid phone it just doesnt allign properly on the screen most of the time your typing so if some ones post looks like it was done by a 5 year old it could be just because there posting from a cell phone
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around January 8th 2012
